thread.section_title: Hotel Excelsior Latin - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location, friendly staff
thread.title_full: Great location, friendly staff - Review of Hotel Excelsior Latin, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Kati888
title: Great location, friendly staff
text:
Great location, easy arrival from CDG airport by RER B train and just few minutes walk to Notre Dame or Quarter Latin.
Friendly and helpful staff since pre-contacting to leaving.
Good French breakfast. Well working wifi in room at 5th floor.
Clean and cozy comfort room. Street noice and voices from nearest room can be heard (earplugs used, so no problem for me).
